mapper.sql: rowid, FEE_CODE, FEE_NAME, FEE_PARENT_CODE, LV, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS,COMPANY_CODE
mapper.select: select rowid, FEE_CODE, FEE_NAME, FEE_PARENT_CODE, LV, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS,COMPANY_CODE from fm_fee_type b where b.FEE_CODE =#{code}
SELECT b.FEE_CODE, b.FEE_NAME FROM fm_fee_type b WHERE b.FEE_PARENT_CODE =- 1 AND b.FEE_CODE NOT IN (28, 21, 25, 24, 22, 0) ORDER BY B.SORTNO

SELECT b.rowid, b.FEE_CODE feeCode, b.FEE_NAME feeName, b.COMPANY_CODE companyCode, b.FEE_PARENT_CODE feeParentCode, c.FEE_NAME feeParentName FROM fm_fee_type b LEFT JOIN fm_fee_type c ON b.FEE_PARENT_CODE = c.FEE_CODE WHERE b.SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = '1' AND b.FEE_CODE =#{feeCode} AND b.COMPANY_CODE =#{companyCode}
mapper.insert: insert into fm_fee_type (rowid, FEE_CODE, FEE_NAME, FEE_PARENT_CODE, LV, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS,COMPANY_CODE) values (#{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{feeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeParentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into fm_fee_type
rowid,
FEE_CODE,
FEE_NAME,
FEE_PARENT_CODE,
LV,
SYS_CREATE_TIME,
SYS_UPDATE_TIME,
SYS_DELETE_TIME,
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG,
REMARKS,
COMPANY_CODE,

mapper.update:
update fm_fee_type
FEE_CODE = #{feeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_NAME = #{feeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_PARENT_CODE = #{feeParentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LV = #{lv,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update fm_fee_type set FEE_CODE = #{feeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE_NAME = #{feeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE_PARENT_CODE = #{feeParentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LV = #{lv,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select rowid, FEE_CODE id, FEE_NAME name, FEE_PARENT_CODE pId, LV, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG, REMARKS,COMPANY_CODE from fm_fee_type where SYS_PROCESS_FLAG='1' and company_code=#{companyCode} order by rowid
